channel.title: zsh on ShrinkLabs
channel.description: Recent content in zsh on ShrinkLabs

item.title: zsh(oh-my-zsh) 사용
item.description: zsh 설치하고 기본 쉘 변경 $ sudo apt-get install zsh $ which zsh /usr/bin/zsh $ chsh -s /usr/bin/zsh oh-my-zsh 설치 $ curl -L https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/raw/master/tools/install.sh | sh 설정(개인 취향) .zshrc 의 ZSH_THEME를 minimal 로 변경 (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
